title: 2020 Collins Road Map Scotland
features: Full color map of Scotland at 8.7 miles to 1 inch (1:550,000) with clear, detailed road network and administrative areas shown in color. The map covers the whole of Scotland and part of Northern England conveniently on one side, and is ideal for reference or route planning. The map shows the road network in detail for easy route planning. It is ideal for business users also, with its political coloring of local council areas. Main features include administrative areas shown in color; clear, detailed road network and road distances; town and city names, rivers, railway lines and canals clearly shown; 7 city/town center street plans showing places of interest; index to place names; mileage chart; car ferry routes; and key in English, French and German.
description: has been publishing educational and informative books for almost 200 years.
